verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Baba tunaleta vipaji
twakuomba sana pokea.
Baba tunaleta twakuomba
sana pokea.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Twaja kushukuru kwa
yote unatujalia wanao.
Baba tunaleta
twakuomba sana pokea.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Baba tunasema,
asante, asante.
Kutupa uzima,
asante, asante.
Kwa kutukomboa,
asante, asante.
Kutuweka huru,
asante, asante.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Mkate na divai twaleta
twakuomba sana pokea.
Baba tunaleta
twakuomba sana pokea.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Ndio kazi yetu wanao
twakuomba sana pokea.
Baba tunaleta
twakuomba sana pokea.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Mazao ya shamba twaleta
twakuomba sana pokea.
Baba tunaleta
twakuomba sana pokea.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Hata ni kidogo twaleta
twakuomba sana pokea.
Baba tunaleta
twakuomba sana pokea.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Nazo fedha zetu twaleta
twakuomba sana pokea.
Baba tunaleta
twakuomba sana pokea.

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
Utupe baraka twaleta
twakuomba sana pokea.
Baba tunaleta
twakuomba sana pokea.

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
Pia nyoyo zetu twaleta
twakuomba sana pokea.
Baba tunaleta
twakuomba sana pokea.

verse.name: v10
verse.lines:
Japo ni kidogo twaleta
twakuomba sana pokea.
Baba tunaleta
twakuomba sana pokea.
